item.title: Building This Website
item.description: This is my first real attempt at building and hosting a website, so I am going to do my best to document this as I go. First, I’m going to give a bit of an oversimplified explanation of the technical stack that will be (or by the time this is posted, is being) used: Hugo - This is the framework we will use for generating our static site. git / GitHub - Version control system/repository for the codebase as we develop.
